Posts.Content: swimmingsailor wrote: I am looking for information concerning the drainage tube and leakage around the tube.  My sister in law is still getting more than 50 cc a day from the tube and especially around the tube.  We think that the surgeon plans to take the drainage tube out in two days.  Has anyone had similiar experiences?
